<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check whether or not the given \\p MBB can be used as a epilogue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for the target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The epilogue will be inserted before the first terminator of that block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method is used by the shrink-wrapping pass to decide if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p MBB will be correctly handled by the target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thumb1framelowering/#aad1b2b97b144a3f9defffbc09bedfbb0">canUseAsEpilogue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check if the frame lowering of \\p MF needs a special fixup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// code sequence for the epilogue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Unlike T2 and ARM mode, the T1 pop instruction cannot restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to LR, and we can&#39;t pop the value directly to the PC when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we need to update the SP after popping the value. So instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we have to emit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   POP &#123;r3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ADD sp, #offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   BX r3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this would clobber a return value, then generate this sequence instead:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   MOV ip, r3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   POP &#123;r3&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   ADD sp, #offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   MOV lr, r3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   MOV r3, ip</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   BX lr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> needPopSpecialFixUp(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emit the special fixup code sequence for the epilogue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see needPopSpecialFixUp for more details.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p DoIt, tells this method whether or not to actually insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the code sequence in \\p MBB. I.e., when \\p DoIt is false,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p MBB is left untouched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns For \\p DoIt == true: True when the emission succeeded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// false otherwise. For \\p DoIt == false: True when the emission</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// would have been possible, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> emitPopSpecialFixUp(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DoIt) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;LIB&#95;TARGET&#95;ARM&#95;THUMB1FRAMELOWERING&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
